text: NASA launched the Mariner 2 unmanned space mission to Venus.
The first direct-to-home TV satellite launched from Cape Canaveral. Marco Polo I delivered the British Satellite Broadcasting service to homes in the UK.
Fairbanks, Alaska got the world's biggest UPS backup. The city hooked up the world's largest storage battery, built to provide an uninterrupted power supply of 40 megawatts.
